app.name: Foodshare
app.tagline: Share food. Reduce waste. Build community.

guidelines.safe_desc: Choose public, well-lit locations for pickups
guidelines.report_desc: Flag concerning listings or behavior to keep our community safe
guidelines.respectful_desc: Treat all community members with kindness and respect
guidelines.communicate_desc: Respond to messages promptly and honor your commitments
guidelines.responsible_desc: Only share safe, quality food that you would eat yourself

app.mission_description: We believe no good food should go to waste. Our mission is to connect neighbors, reduce food waste, and build stronger communities through sharing.

Chat.startNewChat: Start sharing food or connect with the community to begin chatting
Chat.selectConversationDesc: Choose a chat from the sidebar to start messaging

help.title: Help
help.subject: Subject
help.form_desc: Fill out the form below and we will get back to you within 24 hours.
help.thank_you: Thank you for contacting us. We will respond to your message within 24 hours.
help.find_answers: Find answers to common questions about Foodshare
help.support_desc: Our support team is here to help you with any questions or issues.

quick_actions.messaging_content:
Connecting with other users:

1. Open any listing and tap Message
2. Chat to coordinate pickup time/location
3. Be responsive and courteous
4. Confirm pickup arrangements
5. Mark items as collected when done

Tip: Enable notifications to never miss a message!
quick_actions.food_safety_content:
Keep food sharing safe:

• Check expiration dates before sharing
• Store food at proper temperatures
• List all allergens and ingredients
• Use clean, sealed containers
• Be honest about preparation date
• When in doubt, do not share it

Safety is everyones responsibility!
quick_actions.account_help_content:
Managing your account:

• Settings: Update email, password, preferences
• Profile: Edit your bio and profile photo
• Notifications: Control what alerts you receive
• Privacy: Manage location and data settings
• Delete: Permanently remove your account

Go to Profile → Settings for all options.
quick_actions.how_to_share_content:
Sharing food on Foodshare is easy:

1. Tap the + button on the main screen
2. Take or select photos of your food
3. Add a title and description
4. Set the pickup location and availability
5. Publish your listing!

Your food will appear on the map for nearby users to discover.
quick_actions.report_issue_content:
Help keep Foodshare safe:

Report users who:
• Share unsafe or expired food
• Are unresponsive or no-shows
• Use inappropriate language
• Post misleading listings

Report community fridge issues:
• Damaged equipment
• Cleanliness concerns
• Safety hazards

Tap Contact Support below to report.
quick_actions.community_fridges_content:
Community fridges are public refrigerators where anyone can leave or take food.

Finding fridges:
• Look for the fridge icon on the map
• Check hours and guidelines before visiting
• View current stock levels

Contributing:
• Leave surplus food in good condition
• Check in when you visit
• Report any issues you notice

help.need_more_help_desc: Can't find what you're looking for? Send us feedback through your account settings. We typically respond within 24-48 hours.

create_account.question: How do I create an account?
create_account.answer: Click the "Sign Up" button and register with your email or social account. Complete your profile to start sharing food with your community.

share_food.question: How do I share food?
share_food.answer: Click the "+" button to create a new listing. Add photos, description, pickup location, and availability. Your listing will appear on the map for nearby users.

find_food.question: How do I find food near me?
find_food.answer: Use the interactive map to browse available food in your area. You can filter by food type, distance, and availability. Tap on a listing to see details and contact the sharer.

what_food.question: What food can I share?
what_food.answer: Share surplus food that is still safe to eat - unopened packaged goods, fresh produce, home-cooked meals, and baked goods. Always be honest about ingredients and preparation date.

safety_tips.question: Food safety tips
safety_tips.answer:
• Check expiration dates before sharing
• Store food at proper temperatures
• List all allergens and ingredients
• Use clean containers for transport
• When in doubt, don't share it

messaging.question: How do I message someone?
messaging.answer: Open a listing and tap "Message" to start a chat with the sharer. Use chat to coordinate pickup time and location.

edit_listing.question: How do I edit or delete my listing?
edit_listing.answer: Go to your profile and find the listing under "My Listings". Tap the menu icon to edit details or mark as collected/delete.

community_fridges.question: What are community fridges?
community_fridges.answer: Community fridges are public refrigerators where anyone can leave or take food. They appear on the map with a special icon. Check their hours and guidelines before visiting.

settings.question: How do I change my settings?
settings.answer: Go to Settings from your profile menu. You can update your email, password, notification preferences, and privacy settings.

location_shared.question: Is my location shared?
location_shared.answer: Your exact location is never shared. Listings show an approximate area. You control what location details to share when coordinating pickup.

delete_account.question: How do I delete my account?
delete_account.answer: Go to Settings > Account > Delete Account. This will permanently remove your profile, listings, and messages.

help.include_details: Please include as much detail as possible.

messaging.delete_confirmation_message: This will permanently delete this conversation and all messages.

privacy.control_data: Control how your data is used. Essential services cannot be disabled as they're required for the app to function.
privacy.choose_data_use: Choose how you'd like us to use your data

essential.name: Essential Services
essential.description: Required for the app to function. This includes authentication, security, and core features.

analytics.name: Analytics & Improvements
analytics.description: Help us improve the app by sharing anonymous usage data and crash reports.

marketing.name: Marketing Communications
marketing.description: Receive updates about new features, community events, and food sharing tips.

personalization.name: Personalized Experience
personalization.description: Get personalized food recommendations based on your preferences and activity.

location.name: Location Services
location.description: Enable location-based features like nearby listings and distance calculations.

third_party.name: Partner Sharing
third_party.description: Allow us to share data with trusted partners to enhance your experience.

support.coffee_saves_meal: Every coffee helps save a meal
support.title: Support Foodshare

new_user.title: New User
new_user.description: Just joined the community. Limited posting abilities.

basic_user.title: Basic
basic_user.description: Has read enough to understand the community norms.

regular_user.title: Regular
regular_user.description: Trusted community member with proven track record.

leader_user.title: Leader
leader_user.description: Community leader who helps moderate and guide discussions.

widget.start_challenge: Start a challenge in the app!

recommendations.critical: Your account is at risk. Enable biometrics and verify your email immediately.
recommendations.low: Your account needs better protection. Consider enabling more security features.
recommendations.medium: Good start! Enable a few more features for maximum protection.
recommendations.high: Excellent! Your account is well protected.

no_results.title: No Results Found
no_results.message: We couldn't find anything matching "{query}". Try adjusting your search or filters.

no_listings.title: No Food Nearby
no_listings.message: There aren't any food listings in your area yet. Be the first to share!

no_messages.title: No Messages Yet
no_messages.message: Start a conversation by claiming food or responding to requests.

no_favorites.title: No Saved Items
no_favorites.message: Tap the heart icon on listings to save them for later.

no_notifications.title: All Caught Up
no_notifications.message: You don't have any notifications right now. Check back later!

no_user_listings.title: No Listings Yet
no_user_listings.message: Share your surplus food with the community and reduce food waste.

no_reviews.title: No Reviews Yet
no_reviews.message: Complete food exchanges to receive reviews from the community.

network_error.title: Connection Issue
network_error.message: Unable to connect to the server. Please check your internet connection and try again.

generic_error.title: Something Went Wrong
generic_error.message: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

no_forum_posts.title: No Discussions Yet
no_forum_posts.message: Start the conversation! Share tips, ask questions, or connect with the community.

no_challenges.title: No Active Challenges
no_challenges.message: Check back soon for new community challenges and earn badges!

location_permission.title: Location Access Needed
location_permission.message: Enable location services to see food listings near you.
